edu.stanford.nlp.mt.tune

Class MERT

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • edu.stanford.nlp.mt.tune.MERT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class MERT
extends Thread
    Minimum Error Rate Training (MERT). Optimization for non smooth error surfaces.
    Author:
    danielcer, Michel Galley
